roleset.name: natural disaster: wildfire in bush land
roleset.note: BUSHFIRE-N NOTES: Added by Julia in a Natural Disaster roleset endeavor. Comparison to brushfire, wildfire, fire-n.02. (from bushfire.01-n)

roles.note: The "VSP" function tags on 'death/injury toll' and 'damages/cost' correspond to the RED cause relation.

example.name: bushfire-n: arg2
example.text: By mid afternoon, a 5000-acre bushfire moved towards our farm from the northwest, until the cool change from the south came at 5.30.
